intro: Pecluma bourgeauana, commonly known as the African violet, is a flowering plant native to tropical Africa. It belongs to the family Gesneriaceae and is characterized by its rosette-forming leaves and showy, tubular flowers. Pecluma bourgeauana is also noted for its ability to produce offsets, which can be used for propagation.
